meanings.definition: A small, brightly colored tropical bird often kept as a pet.
meanings.sent1: I love watching the parakeets chirping happily in their cage.
meanings.sent2: My sister has two parakeets named Sunny and Sky.
meanings.sent3: The parakeets had a party in their cage last night, singing and dancing.
meanings.sent4: The parakeets in the pet store looked like tiny rainbows come to life.
meanings.sent5: The children giggled as the parakeets hopped from perch to perch.

meanings.definition: A group of parakeets flying together in the sky.
meanings.sent1: Look up! A flock of parakeets is soaring high above us.
meanings.sent2: The colorful parakeets painted a beautiful picture against the blue sky.
meanings.sent3: The parakeets decided to have a race in the sky, flapping their wings furiously.
meanings.sent4: The parakeets in the sky resembled a moving rainbow as they flew in formation.
meanings.sent5: The children pointed excitedly at the parakeets gliding gracefully through the air.
